TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Eric_Bledsoe, title = Eric_Bledsoe, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Bledsoe} }

S.FORM: Eric Bledsoe nalecuhan i Birmingham, Alabama, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Eric Bledsoe i 2010 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 18, namapili' tu nu Oklahoma City Thunder putiput. 12 bulad 9 demiad, 1989 a mihca, Eric Bledsoe, miunduay.

Eric Bledsoe nalecohan i Birmingham, Alabama, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Eric Bledsoe i 2010 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ko owac ato silsil 18, namapili' to no Oklahoma City Thonder potipot. 12 bolad 9 demiad, 1989 a mihca, Eric Bledsoe, miondoay.
